layer.name: Discipline
layer.definition: Do what needs doing, especially when you don't feel like it.

questions.text: When a commitment becomes inconvenient, I ...
questions.principle: Integrity with yourself is the foundation

answers.4: usually finish, though I occasionally need someone to hold me to it
answers.5: execute — difficulty doesn't change my course
answers.2: follow through if it's easy, back out if it's hard
answers.3: push through sometimes — depends on my mood

questions.text: When something hard needs to be done, I ...
questions.principle: Eat the Frog; do it first

answers.4: usually tackle it without much negotiation, though some things test me
answers.5: do it first — if I don't feel like it, that's exactly why I should
answers.2: negotiate with myself until I find a reason it can wait
answers.3: do it sometimes, but often after significant internal resistance

questions.text: When I need to make a decision, I ...

answers.4: usually decide efficiently, occasionally overthinking complex situations
answers.5: decide, act, and adjust — waiting for perfect information is its own decision
answers.2: make it slowly and often second-guess it
answers.3: decide reasonably well on small things, get stuck on bigger ones
answers.1: research endlessly and often never choose

questions.text: When I fail to follow through, I ...

answers.4: usually analyze and try again, though I occasionally repeat mistakes
answers.5: treat it as data — examine, adjust, go again
answers.2: find the reasons why it was not my fault
answers.3: sometimes examine it, sometimes just feel bad and move on
answers.1: give up and move on — failure proves I can't do it

questions.text: Small daily disciplines (bed made, dishes done, space organized) are ...
questions.principle: Clean your room; small behaviors predict large ones

answers.5: automatic — my environment is ordered because of them
answers.2: something I know matters but can't seem to keep up
answers.3: inconsistent — I'm disciplined in some areas but not others
answers.1: not something I maintain — my environment reflects my chaos
